snippet.title: Floating Stools
snippet.description: * Floating Stools Cystic Fibrosis Cystic fibrosis is an inherited and often fatal disease that causes an excess production of thick and sticky mucus in the lungs and digestive tract. The excess mucus in the pancreas prevents the proper absorption of nutrients, which can...
